languages.text: "Тебе недостаточно того, что порядок и Имперское Согласие будут восстановлены в пределах станции? Вижу, что ты слишком многому научил{mf|ся|ась} у Теодоры — ее самодовольству, жадности и равнодушию к долгу".
"Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."
languages.original_text: "Тебе недостаточно того, что порядок и Имперское Согласие будут восстановлены в пределах станции? Вижу, что ты слишком многому научил{mf|ся|ась} у Теодоры — ее самодовольству, жадности и равнодушию к долгу".

traits.locale_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you adopted too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you adopted too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you adopted too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you adopted too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “落脚港会恢复秩序，也会重新忠于帝国，莫非这样的结果还不能让你满意吗？看得出来，你已经从西奥多拉身上学到了太多东西。你就像她一样傲慢、贪婪，对责任漠不关心。”
languages.original_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."

traits.locale_text: “落脚港会恢复秩序，也会重新服从帝国，莫非这样的结果还不能让你满意吗？看得出来，你已经受到了西奥多拉太多影响，你就像她一样傲慢、贪婪，对责任漠不关心。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「フットフォールの秩序回復と帝国法規が復元される。お前はそれで満足しないのか？お前はシオドーラの影響…彼女の傲慢さ、貪欲さ、義務への無関心を受けすぎたようだ」
languages.original_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールの秩序回復と帝国法規が復元される。お前はそれで満足しないのか？お前はシオドーラの影響…彼女の傲慢さ、貪欲さ、義務への無関心を受けすぎたようだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «¿No es satisfactorio que el orden y sometimiento imperial se hayan restaurado en Paso? Veo que se le han pegado muchas cosas de Theodora, como su arrogancia, codicia e indiferencia por el deber».
languages.original_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."

traits.locale_text: «¿No es satisfactorio que el orden y sometimiento imperial se hayan restaurado en Paso? Veo que se le han pegado muchas cosas de Theodora, como su arrogancia, codicia e indiferencia por el deber».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Erfreut es Euch nicht, dass auf Footfall wieder Ordnung und imperiale Konformität hergestellt werden? Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr zu viel von Theodora gelernt. Ihre Hybris, ihre Gier, ihre Gleichgültigkeit der Pflicht gegenüber."
languages.original_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."

traits.locale_text: "Erfreut es Euch nicht, dass auf Footfall wieder Ordnung und imperiale Konformität hergestellt werden? Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr zu viel von Theodora übernommen. Ihre Hybris, ihre Gier, ihre Gleichgültigkeit der Pflicht gegenüber."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Cela ne vous suffit-il pas de savoir que l'ordre et le respect de la loi impériale reviendront à Castel ? Je constate que vous avez beaucoup trop appris de Théodora, notamment son orgueil, sa cupidité et son indifférence vis-à-vis de son devoir. »
languages.original_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."

traits.locale_text: « Cela ne vous suffit-il pas de savoir que l'ordre et le respect de la loi impériale reviendront à Castel ? Je constate que vous avez adopté les travers de Théodora, notamment son orgueil, sa cupidité et son indifférence vis-à-vis de son devoir. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Düzenin ve İmparatorluk'a Riayet'in Binliman'a geri dönecek olması seni yeterince tatmin etmiyor mu? Görüyorum ki Theodora'dan çok şey almışsın. Spesifik olmak gerekirse onun kibrini, açgözlülüğünü ve sorumsuzluğunu."
languages.original_text: "Does it not satisfy you that order and Imperial Compliance will be restored on Footfall? I see you learned too much from Theodora — namely, her hubris, greed, and indifference to duty."

traits.locale_text: "Düzenin ve İmparatorluk'a Riayet'in Binliman'a geri dönecek olması seni yeterince tatmin etmiyor mu? Görüyorum ki Theodora'dan biraz fazla şey öğrenmişsin. Spesifik olmak gerekirse onun kibrini, açgözlülüğünü ve sorumsuzluğunu."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
